_comment: MCP Server Configuration. Use ${VAR} for environment variables. Set enabled: false to disable.
_docs: Browse all 20+ servers: GET /api/mcp/catalog | Add from catalog: POST /api/mcp/servers/from-catalog/:id

memory._description: Knowledge graph-based persistent memory (no auth required)

fetch._description: Web content fetching and conversion (no auth required)

github._description: GitHub API - repos, issues, PRs (requires GITHUB_TOKEN)

brave-search._description: Web search via Brave API (requires BRAVE_API_KEY)

git._description: Tools to read, search, and manipulate Git repositories
